name: Finneas
text: (The nurse doesn't seem to be looking... should I knock this cabinet over as a distraction?)

options.text: No, there must be a better way...

name: Finneas
text: (With a loud CRASH, the cabinet topples over! The nurse jumps in surprise.)

name: Finneas
text: Hmm... I wonder why the Nurse is always looking for the Janitor? Maybe there's a better way...
